title: Dear fellow Pengu Swordsmen.
body:
Today my fellow Pengu men.. is the day we shall strike our enemies hard.
My fellow Pengu swordsmen; we shall rule TFT with our mentally and mindset. We are Pengu Spartans we shall carry out our duties with our swords.

We shall fall in front of our enemies with our sword with it or on it.

By Pengu Commander, 
Shleelpboy.
